header.title: TOPdesk Release Notes
header.description: Discover the latest updates and improvements in TOPdesk.

terms.connectToTopdeskDescription: Enter your TOPdesk URL, username and application password to connect to your environment.

messages.notDevelopmentBy: This product is not developed, supported, or affiliated with TOPdesk. Best effort only.
messages.credentialsValidTopdesk: Authentication credentials and permissions are valid

welcomePage.message: This wizard helps you connect to your TOPdesk and Microsoft Intune environment to audit assets using data from Microsoft Intune.
welcomePage.feature1: Complete overview of assets, filtered by templates and status. Expandable with all additional fields
welcomePage.feature4: Compare assignments with last logged-in Intune user
welcomePage.feature5: Open resources directly in TOPdesk or Intune
welcomePage.feature6: Automatically update one or multiple assignments with just a single click
welcomePage.feature7: Fully hosted in your browser, your data always stays local and secure
welcomePage.feature9: Option to exclude assets from the audit
